content: I think that as The strip has performed well as Las Vegas has hit its kind of peak demand, that our locals business has also performed extremely well because we do get -- whether it's overflow pricing from the strip as the strip hotel rooms fill up, we're able to price our hotel rooms higher or whether it's just increased visitation as in the case of Downtown Las Vegas, where a large percentage of visitors to the strip visit Downtown Las Vegas and so we get the benefit of that.
